p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: April 15, 2020

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Learning Packet Procedures

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Dear Parents,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: The next round of learning packets for your children will be available here at the elementary school on Friday, April 17 from 10:00 am â€“ 2:00 pm. This packet will include enough to provide distance learning through the rest of the school year, just in case it is required. We will be so happy to get permission to open our doors again. In order to maintain social distancing and in an effort to keep everyone as safe as possible, we will do the packet pick up in a drive thru sort of style very similar to the first time.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: The front parking lot will not have any cars parked facing the school building so that area can become the drive thru zone. A staff member will watch for you to pull in and retrieve the appropriate packet. We will place the packet on a nearby table or drop it in your vehicle. Then, you can be on your way.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: If your child has completed the Roaring Reader work, it is time to get that turned in. They are due to the school by Thursday, April 23. They have made some extensions on when the ticket can be used as well. We will have a crate labeled â€œRoaring Reader Turn Inâ€ for the forms.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: If your child has books from the MJE library, please also be rounding those up to return to the school. We will also have a bin for those. Also, for kindergarteners, 1st Graders, and 4th Graders please return any completed packets. They will be collected in bins as well.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Please donâ€™t hesitate to reach out to your childâ€™s teacher or the office to let us know if you will not be able to come during this time and we can make other arrangements.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: We sure miss seeing kids here at school.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Thank you so much for your support and patience,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Diane Hardin

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: 15 de abril de 2020

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Procedimientos de paquetes de aprendizaje

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Queridos padres,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: La prÃ³xima ronda de paquetes de aprendizaje para sus hijos estarÃ¡ disponible aquÃ­ en la escuela primaria el viernes 17 de abril de 10:00 a.m. a 2:00 p.m. Este paquete incluirÃ¡ lo suficiente para proporcionar aprendizaje a distancia durante el resto del aÃ±o escolar, en caso de que sea necesario. Estaremos muy contentos de obtener permiso para abrir nuestras puertas nuevamente. Con el fin de mantener el distanciamiento social y en un esfuerzo por mantener a todos lo mÃ¡s seguros posible, recogeremos el paquete en una unidad a travÃ©s de un estilo muy similar a la primera vez.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: El estacionamiento delantero no tendrÃ¡ ningÃºn automÃ³vil estacionado frente al edificio de la escuela para que esa Ã¡rea pueda convertirse en la zona de acceso. Un miembro del personal lo vigilarÃ¡ para que entre y recupere el paquete apropiado. Colocaremos el paquete en una mesa cercana o lo dejaremos en su vehÃ­culo. Entonces, puedes seguir tu camino.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Si su hijo ha completado el trabajo de Roaring Reader, es hora de que lo entreguen. Deben llegar a la escuela el jueves 23 de abril. Han hecho algunas extensiones sobre cuÃ¡ndo se puede usar el boleto tambiÃ©n. Tendremos una caja llamada "Roaring Reader Turn In" para los formularios.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Si su hijo tiene libros de la biblioteca de MJE, por favor tambiÃ©n traiga los libros para regresar a la escuela. TambiÃ©n tendremos una caja para esos.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: AdemÃ¡s, para los alumnos de kinder, 1er y 4to grado, devuelva los paquetes completos. TambiÃ©n se recogerÃ¡n en cajas

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: No dude en comunicarse con el maestro de su hijo o la oficina para informarnos si no podrÃ¡ venir durante este tiempo y podemos hacer otros arreglos.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Echamos de menos ver a los niÃ±os aquÃ­ en la escuela.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Muchas gracias por su apoyo y paciencia.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Diane Hardin

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
text-align: center;

br.span:
Kindergarten Kickoff has been postponed until further notice.
Please check our website and Facebook Page for updates.Â

p.style: text-align: left;

div.p:
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â
On behalf of our Federal Programs department, I am pleased to introduce PURPOSITY!
In our mission to meet both academic and basic human needs of our students, we are always looking to join forces with partners and organizations who will help us make a bigger impact in the lives of the students we serve. With this in mind, we are excited to introduce our newest partner, Purposity!
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â

p.style: text-align: left;
p.span:
If you knew a kid down the street had a simple need â€“ say she needed sneakers for school â€“ chances are youâ€™d help, right? But, itâ€™s hard to know the needs of real people in your community because thereâ€™s never been a way to connect the people who could really use
help with the people who want to offer it.Â
Â
Enter our new app partnership: Purposity. Its name comes from purpose + generosity, and it allows you to quickly and easily lend a hand to our students.Â
By signing up, youâ€™re sent one weekly notification with specific needs: it might be a winter jacket for a student in one of our schools or household essentials for a family that lost its home in a fire. You decide if you want to help and meet a need in just a few clicks, right from your phone. Youâ€™ll know exactly who youâ€™re helping and why. Itâ€™s the simplest way to make an impact locally.Â
Â
To be a part of our Purposity movement, download the app in the App Store or Google Play, and follow the PARMA SCHOOL DISTRICT.Â Â As soon as we hit 200 followers, we will begin posting up needs.Â
Purposity Intro Video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rkgd8V8STPQ
LIanne Yamamoto and Katie Stimpson are the "gurus" on this project so please contact them if you have questions or need information or assistance.
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: April 3, 2020

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Monday, April 6 the Parma School District buses will begin delivering grab and go meals at every regular bus stop in our district. They will run the routes two hours later than the normal morning route times. Therefore, if your normal pick up time is 7:05 am, for the meal deliveries your time will be 9:05 am. They will stop at every normal stop Monday, April 6 â€“ Wednesday, April 8. Beginning Thursday, if your child has not picked up a grab and go meal, the driver will no longer stop unless you call the transportation department to specifically request meal delivery.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: If you would like grab and go meals and do not normally ride the bus, please call the transportation department to identify where the stop would be for your child. If your child lives here in town, and normally walks to school, lunches will still be available at the Parma Middle School location from 10:00 am â€“ 12:00 pm.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Your child or children need to meet the bus to get their meals. The meals are available to all kids aged 1 â€“ 18 years old.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Shannon Widmer â€“ Transportation Supervisor â€“ (208) 779-4069 ext. 1811 or swidmer@parmaschools.org

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Jean Warren â€“ Food Services Supervisor â€“ (208) 779-4069 ext. 1414 or jwarren@parmaschools.org MJE office â€“ (208) 779-4069 ext. 1102 or mjeoffice@parmaschools.org

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Take care,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Diane Hardin

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: 3 de abril de 2020

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Queridos padres,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: El lunes 6 de abril, los autobuses del distrito escolar de Parma comenzaran a entregar comidas para llevar en cada parada de autobÃºs regular en nuestro distrito. Ejecutaran las rutas dos horas mÃ¡s tarde que los horarios normales de la maÃ±ana. Por lo tanto, si u horario normal de recogida es a las 7:05 a.m., para las entregas de comida su horario serÃ¡ a las 9:05 a.m. Se detendrÃ¡ en todas las paradas normales del lunes 6 de abril al miÃ©rcoles 8 de abril. A partir del jueves, si su higo no ha recogido una comida para llevar, el conductor ya no se detendrÃ¡ a menos que llame al departamento de transporte para solicitar especÃ­ficamente le entrega de comida.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Si desea tomar y llevar comidas y normalmente no viaje en el autobÃºs, llame al departamento de transporte para identificar donde serÃ­a la parada para su hijo. Si su higo vive aquÃ­ en la ciudad, y normalmente camina a la escuela, los almuerzos y comidas seguirÃ¡n disponibles en la ubicaciÃ³n de la escuela intermedia de las 10:00 am a 12:00 am.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Si hijo o hijos deben ir al autobÃºs para recibir sus comidas. Las comidas estÃ¡n disponibles para todos los niÃ±os de 1 a 18 aÃ±os.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Shannon Widmer â€“ Supervisora de Transporte â€“ (208) 779-4069 ext. 1811, swidmer@parmaschools.org

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Jean Warren â€“ Supervisora de Servicios Alimenticios â€“ (208) 779-4069 ext. 1414, jwarren@parmaschools.org Oficia de MJE â€“ (208) 779-4069 ext. 1102, mjeoffice@parmaschools.org

div.p: March 31, 2020

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Learning Packet Procedures

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Dear Parents,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: The learning packets for your children will be available here at the elementary school on Wednesday, April 1 from 10:00 am â€“ 2:00 pm. In order to maintain social distancing and in an effort to keep everyone as safe as possible, we will do the packet pick up in a drive thru sort of style.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: The front parking lot will not have any cars parked facing the school building so that area can become the drive thru zone. A staff member will watch for cars to pull in and notify other staff inside as to whose packet is needed. The packet will then be placed on a nearby table under a canopy for the parent to grab very quickly. Then, you can be on your way.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: If your child has completed the Roaring Reader work and you would like to turn the form in, you are welcome to do that. We will have a crate on the packet pick up table labeled â€œRoaring Reader Turn Inâ€ and you can leave the form so it can be submitted.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Please donâ€™t hesitate to reach out to your childâ€™s teacher or the office to let us know if you will not be able to come during this time and we can make other arrangements. Also, let us know if you are need of food and are not able to access the grab and go meals at the Middle School site.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: As a side note, please know we understand you are trying to take on lots of new things especially if you have children in multiple buildings. It may very well seem overwhelming here especially at the beginning. Please know the teachers and staff here at MJE and in our district are here to support you in any way we can. We will make adjustments along the way as we see what the issues are.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Thank you so much for your support and patience,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Diane Hardin

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: 31 de marzo de 2020

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Procedimientos de paquetes de aprendizaje

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Queridos padres,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Los paquetes de aprendizaje para sus hijos estarÃ¡n disponibles aquÃ­ en la escuela primaria el miÃ©rcoles primero de abril de 10:00 a.m. a 2:00 p.m. Con el fin de mantener el distanciamiento social y en un esfuerzo por mantener a todos lo mÃ¡s seguros possible recojeran los paquetes en forma de drive thru.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: El estacionamiento delantero no tendrÃ¡ ningÃºn automÃ³vil estacionado frente al edificio de la escuela para que esa Ã¡rea pueda convertirse en la zona de acceso. Un miembro del personal vigilarÃ¡ la llegada de los automÃ³viles y notificarÃ¡ a otros miembros del personal sobre quÃ© paquete se necesita. El paquete se colocarÃ¡ en una mesa cercana debajo de un carpa para que los padres lo agarren muy rÃ¡pidamente. Entonces, puedes seguir tu camino.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Si su hijo ha completado el trabajo de Roaring Reader y le gustarÃ­a entregar el formulario, puede hacerlo. Tendremos una caja en la mesa de recogida de paquetes con la etiqueta "Roaring Reader Turn In" y puede dejar el formulario para que pueda enviarlo.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: No dude en comunicarse con el maestro de su hijo o la oficina para informarnos si no podrÃ¡ venir durante este tiempo y podemos hacer otros arreglos. AdemÃ¡s, avÃ­senos si necesita alimentos y no puede acceder a las comidas para llevar en la escuela intermedia.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Por favor sepa que entendemos que estÃ¡ tratando de asumir muchas cosas nuevas, especialmente si tiene niÃ±os en varios edificios. Puede paracer estresante especialmente al principio. Por favor sepa que los maestros y el personal aquÃ­ en MJE y en nuestro distrito estÃ¡n aquÃ­ para apoyarlo en todo lo que podamos. Haremos ajustes a medida que veamos cuÃ¡les son los problemas.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Muchas gracias por su apoyo y paciencia.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Diane Hardin

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

span.style: font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 31, 30);

br.style: -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

span.style: font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 31, 30);

br.span: Many students and parents have received emails from teachers regarding work for the week.Â Some teachers have sent out work for the next three weeks.

br.style: -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

span.style: font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 31, 30);

br.span: For those teachers who have supplements in the forms of books that need to go out and hard copy of packets who cannot access assignments on-line, we will have those available for pick-up on Wednesday and Thursday 10:00 AM â€“ 2:00 PM.Â If you cannot make that time, please let us know and we will work something out.Â Packet pick-up will be outside of the main office of Parma Middle School.

br.style: -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

span.style: font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 31, 30);

br.span: We also will be rounding up students textbooks and will have all that we can available for pick-up.

br.style: -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

span.style: font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 31, 30);

br.span: After Wednesdayâ€™s pick-up, we are asking that work is returned and any new packets can be picked up on Mondays from 10-2:00.

br.style: -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

span.style: font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 31, 30);

br.span: Teachers â€œOffice Hoursâ€ to respond to emails or extra tutoring through Zoom will be 9:00 AM â€“ 2:30 PM.

br.style: -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

span.style: font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 31, 30);

br.span: In order not to overwhelm students and parents we wanted to suggest that students do daily work with Math and ELA Monday through Thursday and use Friday as a catchup or IXL day.Â Science and Social Studies will have 2 assignments a week.Â We suggest students do Science on Monday and Wednesday and Social Studies on Tuesday and Thursday.Â PE has a daily activity log to help get students moving and choir, band and intro to ag have a weekly assignment.

br.style: -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

span.style: font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 31, 30);

br.span: We will be using IXL for tracking daily attendance so we are asking that every student who can log in and complete at least one IXL Math task per day.Â This can be done on a smart phone as well as a tablet or computer.Â For students who do not have access to IXL please send an email to Mrs. Layne @ tlayne@parmaschools.org and let her know your student worked on academics for the day.Â This is the best way we have thought to complete attendance at this time.

br.style: -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

span.style: font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 31, 30);

br.span: We are still keeping track of mastered skills for the IXL Challenge through April 20th.Â We will have rewards ready for those students who have earned it when they return to school.Â So keep up the great work everyone!!

br.style: -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px;

span.style: font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 31, 30);

br.span: Â

br.span: Go Panthers!!

br.span: Stoney T. Winston

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: March 29, 2020

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Dear MJE Parents,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Thank you to those of you who have taken time to complete the survey sent to you. The results will help us to plan for this unique time in hopes of continuing to provide the best learning opportunity and support for your children during this distance learning period.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Teachers have already been working to prepare. If we did not get a survey from you, they will be contacting you to answer those same questions. So, if you havenâ€™t already, it would be helpful if you would please complete the survey. Teachers will let parents know what their hours will be for helping students each day. We are planning to provide split sessions, one in the morning and one in the late afternoon or early evening to best accommodate students.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: The MJE office will be open from 10:00 am â€“ 2:00 pm this week to answer calls and make connections with families to better meet the needs of everyone. Any new learning packets will be ready to be picked up beginning Wednesday, April 1 â€“ Friday, April 3 between the hours of 10:00 am â€“ 2:00 pm. Please let your childâ€™s teacher or the office know if times will not work for you because of a lack of transportation, illness, or you are working. The building will be closed to student access.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Please check your email, our Parma School District website, and/or Facebook page for updates and information. Your childâ€™s teacher will set up a daily line of communication if one has not already been established. If your child does not already know login information to online curricular resources, they will also be receiving those.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: We are still here to help so please reach out to let us know what you need. It will be so sad for me to be in our school tomorrow without your children there. Please take care.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Thank you,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Diane Hardin

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: 29 de marzo 2020

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Querido Padres de MJE,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Gracias a ustedes que se han tomado el tiempo para completar la encuesta que se les enviÃ³. Los resultados nos ayudaran a planificar este momento Ãºnico con la esperanza de continuar brindando la mejor oportunidad de aprendizaje y apoyo para sus higos durante este periodo de aprendizaje a distancia.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Los maestros ya han estado trabajando para prepararse. Si no recibimos una encuesta suya, se comunicarÃ¡n con usted para responder esas mismas preguntas. Por lo tanto, si aÃºn no lo ha hecho, serÃ­a Ãºtil completa la encuesta. Los maestros informarÃ¡n a los padres cuÃ¡les serÃ¡n sus horarios para ayudar a los estudiantes cada dÃ­a. Estamos planeando ofrecer sesiones divididas, una en la maÃ±ana y otra en la tarde o temprano en la noche para acomodar mejor a los estudiantes.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: La oficina de MJE estarÃ¡ abierta de 10:00 am a 2:00 pm esta semana para responder llamadas y establecer conexiones con las familias para satisfacer mejor las necesidades de todos. Todos los paquetes de aprendizaje nuevos estarÃ¡n listos para ser recogidos a partir del miÃ©rcoles 1 de abril al viernes 3 de abril entre las 10:00 am y las 2:00 pm. Por favor informe a la maestra de su hijo o a la oficina se los horarios no van a funcionar para usted debido a la falta de transporte, enfermedad, o si estÃ¡ trabajando. El edificio estarÃ¡ cerrado al acceso de los estudiantes.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Por favor revise su correo electrÃ³nico, nuestro sitio de web del distrito escolar de Parma y/o la pÃ¡gina de Facebook para informaciÃ³n actual. El maestro de su hijo establecerÃ¡ una lÃ­nea de comunicaciÃ³n diaria si aÃºn no se ha establecido. Si su hijo aÃºn no conoce la informaciÃ³n de entra a los recursos curriculares en el web, tambiÃ©n los recibirÃ¡n.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: TodavÃ­a estamos aquÃ­ para ayudar, asÃ­ que por favor comunÃ­quese con nosotros para los que necesitan. Sera muy triste para mi estar en nuestra escuela maÃ±ana sin sus higos allÃ­. Por favor cuÃ­dense.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Gracias,

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Diane Hardin

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Â

br.span: The Office of the State Board of Education (OSBE) has closed all Idaho public schools until April 20

span.span: . School district administrators are currently working on plans to implement the guidelines specified by the OSBE. As plans are finalized they will be made available on the district website and Facebook page.

p.style: text-align: center;
margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
p.span: Yesterday, the Parma School District Board of Trustees interviewed two candidates for the Superintendent position. Last night the board moved forward in offering the position to Mr. Stoney Winston.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
p.span: Thank you to all the staff and community who provided questions, watched the Q&A and commented on the candidates. Mr. Winston will take his new position as Superintendent on July 1, following Mr. Norton's retirement.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px 0px; display: inline; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: For Immediate Release

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: March 20, 2020

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Parma School Board Selects Next Superintendent to Lead the District

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: The Parma School District Board of Trustees selected Stoney Winston as the next Superintendent to lead the District. Winston will replace Superintendent Jim Norton, who retires at the end of June after serving as the Superintendent for 19 years.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: This decision came after a lengthy process, facilitated by the Idaho School Boards Association, and included 11 applicants spanning across the country as well as in-state.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: The Board held several meetings throughout the process, which included reviewing candidate applications, studying survey input from the community and staff, conducting reference checks and research, a community and staff online feedback session, and held interviews.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: â€œParma has a wonderful school district and community. The Board spent many hours reviewing candidates and comparing it to the feedback of our staff and community. We believe Mr. Winston will continue the great work of our district while bringing new ideas for advancement and success,â€ said Rod Nielsen, Parma School Board Chairman.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

div.p: Mr. Winston currently serves as the Principal at Parma Middle School. Prior to that, he served as Assistant Principal/Athletic Director, Summer School Principal, and Director 21st CCLC After-School Programs at Middleton School District, and a Social Studies Teacher at Cambridge School District. He received a bachelorâ€™s degree in Social Studies from University Nevada Reno, a masterâ€™s degree in Educational Leadership from the University of Idaho, and an educational specialist certificate in Educational Leadership from the University of Idaho.

p.style: text-align: center;
text-align: center;
text-align: center;

strong.span: Message from Jim Norton, Superintendent of the Parma School District in regards to COVID-19

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

em.span: Â

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal;

em.span: Dear Parents and Staff:

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal;

em.span: Â

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal;

em.span: As I mentioned in my previous notice sent out yesterday, our administrative staff is meeting daily to review the current COVID-19 situation affecting the Parma School District. Our administrative team has determined that the best course of action is to close our schools beginning on Wednesday, March 18th. We plan to reopen schools as scheduled on Monday, March 30th.

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal;

em.span: Â

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal;

em.span: Many aspects of our lives are now being affected by the arrival of COVID-19 in Idaho.Â All of us will be thinking about how best to get through the spread of infection during the next few months. Extracurricular decisions are being made in accordance with IHSAA directives, as detailed below. All competitions and practices are suspended effective March 17 through April 5.

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal;

em.span: Updated information will be provided as it becomes available through e-mail and on our district website (www.parmaschools.org).

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

em.span: Â

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal;

em.span: Sincerely,

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal;

em.span: Â

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal;

em.span: Jim Norton

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: background: white;

span.style: color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

em.span: Here, in full, is the IHSAA statement:

p.style: background: white;

span.style: color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

em.span: The Idaho High School Activities Association, in the response to COVID-19, and to best serve our member schools, student participants, coaches and Idaho families are announcing the following:

span.style: color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

em.span: Cancellation of the associationâ€™s State Cheer/Dance Championships, this event will not be re-scheduled.

span.style: color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

em.span: The State Debate Championship is still postponed as we work on the possibility of combining with the State Speech Championships.

span.style: color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

em.span: Suspension of sanctioned sports and activities for all of its member schools effective Tuesday, March 17 through Sunday, April 5.Â

p.style: background: white;

span.style: color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

em.span: Implementing cancellations and/or suspension is taken in part with consultation with public health officials to implement best practices in slowing the spread of COVID 19 and therefore aid in protection of students and the general public; to reduce competitive inequity among member schools and in an effort to have the opportunity to hold our spring state tournaments/events on the assigned dates/sites as those dates will not be extended.

p.style: background: white;

span.style: color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

em.span: During the suspension, IHSAA member schools are not to compete in games or contests. Member schools are not to conduct practices in IHSAA sanctioned sports at any location. Neither member schools nor their coaches nor student athletes are to hold meetings. Member schools are not to allow students or coaches at any IHSAA member school to use the schoolâ€™s athletic facilities for a practice, game or contest in any IHSAA sanctioned sport regardless of the affiliation (club or otherwise) of the group seeking to use the facilities. The use of athletic facilities for currently scheduled classes as a part of the regular school curriculum such as P.E. classes is allowed. Â Rule 8-11, Outside Competition is still in effect.Â

p.style: background: white;

span.style: color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

em.span: The IHSAA office as well as the Board of Directors, will continue to monitor the rapidly changing landscape of the COVID-19 information and will work with our member schools and health officials to make informed and well thought out decisions.Â

p.style: background: white;

span.style: color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

em.span: Additional information will be sent to schools and/or districts as it becomes available.

div.p: Â

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman";

span.strong: Message from Jim Norton, Superintendent of the Parma School District in regards to COVID-19

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

hr.p: We have spoken with various government agencies at every level of government, including Central District Health (CDH), The Department of Health and Welfare, the State Board of Education, The State Department of Education, and the Governorâ€™s Office. Today Governor Little held a conference call with state health officials along with school district leaders to inform us of the most current situation in regards to COVID-19.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

hr.p: This was a very informative discussion and agencies at every level of government urged us to continue school as normal. We are continuing school tomorrow. You may hear of other districts closing for a period of time. At this point these decisions are being left at the local level. Our current situation in the Parma School District does not warrant school closure. There will most likely be some impacts on extra-curricular activities and trips. Those decisions will be made on a case by case basis so please check regularly with coaches and advisors.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

hr.p: Many aspects of your lives are now being affected by the arrival of COVID-19 in Idaho. All of us will be thinking about how best to get through the spread of infection during the next few months. At the heart of our decision-making process was thinking about what is best for our students, our families, and the community as a whole. The decision meant thinking about all of the students we serve, from those who depend on the various services our schools offer to students who profit from their academic success.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;

hr.p: Events are changing rapidly, and our administrative staff will meet each day to review what steps we will need to take next. We are following the most current guidelines from the CDC - Review the CDC's New Guidance on School Closures. Plans are in place at each of our schools if we were to be dealing with a possible contagion in one of our schools. Extra precautions are being taken to sanitize our facilities. We also strongly recommend that if a student suffers from some form of a compromised health issue that they should stay at home if possible. Other attendance concerns should be addressed on an individual basis with the building administration.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium;
text-align: right;

br.span: If you would like to use a facility in the Parma School District, you must first fill out a Facilities Use Agreement 30 days in advance of the use date.Â If you are wanting to use multiple facilities, a Facilities Use Agreement will be needed for each location. The Facilities Use Agreement will be reviewed by the building Principal, Athletic Director and finalized by the Superintendent. The authorization must be approved BEFORE the facilities can be used.

If you are planning on using a facility for more than one use or ongoing, you will need to fill out the calendar in the forms below. A submitted calendar will be needed for each facility, team or event.
Upon approval, the Facilities Use Tally Sheet will be filled out by the District to figure the fee.
You will also need to provide the District with a Certificate of Insurance.Â
Per the FacilitiesÂ Use Agreement:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: black;

p.span: Insurance and Indemnification

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: black;

p.span: The requesting organization or individual, by signature below, hereby guarantees that the organization shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless the District and any of its employees or agents from any liability, expenses, costs (including attorneyâ€™s fees) damages and/or losses arising out of injuries or death to any person or persons or damage to any property of any kind in connection with the organization or individualâ€™s use of the District facility which are not the result of fraud, willful injury to a person or property or the willful or negligent violation of a law. The requesting organization or individual shall provide the District with a certificate of insurance prior to the use of the facility. The certificate shall show coverage for comprehensive general liability insurance in an amount not less than $1,000,000 for injuries to or death of any person or damage to or loss of property arising out of or in any way resulting from the described use of the facility.

span.style: font-size: medium; text-align: right; font-family: inherit; color: rgb(29, 33, 41);

p.span: Â

p.style: text-align: right;

span.br:
You will find the General Requirements, Special Requirements and RestrictionsÂ on Use, in Policy 910. You can click the link below to read the full Policy.
910 Rental-Use of School Dist Facilities (1).pdf
FORMS
Facilities Use Agreement.pdf

br.span: Â standing-up-to-cyberbullying-tips-for-teens.pdf

p.style: text-align: left;
text-align: left;
p.span: We are in need of reliable substitute teachers. If you are interested in being a substitute teacher, please visit our website for an application. If you have any questions, please donâ€™t hesitate to contact our Substitute Coordinator, Emily Obenchain, at eobenchain@parmaschools.org or (208)779-4069 ext. 1602.
Â

p.span: In order to apply for the Bruce Mitchell Scholarship, Parma seniors must have a 3.0 cumulative GPA

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Eras Medium ITC";

p.span: and

test scores of 18 ACT Composite and/or 960 SAT Composite Scores. This test score requirement is new. The Foundation also plans to change their award formula to include overall application, essay, and interviews in determining Bruce Mitchell Awards

strong.span:
You can contact Jean Warren if you have any Question or concerns.
(208) 779 -4069 ext 1414.

Meal Prices for 2019 - 2020 school year have increased from last year.Â
Lunch prices areÂ Â $2.35Â for KGÂ - 4thÂ Grade andÂ

em.span: Free breakfast will be offered at schools.Â

p.span: A monthly price list will be on our webpage (http://www.parmaschools.org/food_service) along with the monthly lunch menus. I encourage everyone to fill out a free or reduced price lunch application. Â TO RECEIVE FREE OR REDUCED LUNCHES YOU MUST FILL OUT A NEWÂ APPLICATIONÂ FOR THIS SCHOOL YEAR.Â We will have a table set up at registration if you would like to make a prepayments or fill out a free or reduced lunch application. The Free and Reduced Application will also be available in the online registration process.Â
